title: Product Manager, Content Promotion and Distribution, Creative Innovation
overview: The Product Manager, Content Promotion and Distribution, Creative Innovation at Netflix is responsible for developing innovative approaches to how content is promoted, localized, and distributed, with a focus on balancing the needs of members and content creators.
description:
Los Gatos, CA, Los Angeles, CA or North America Remote

Netflix is one of the world's leading streaming entertainment services with 238 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, documentaries, feature films and mobile games across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can play, pause and resume watching as they want, anytime, anywhere, and can change their plans at any time. 

Content Promotion and Distribution sits at the intersection of the consumer experience and the Netflix Studio. Our team is integral to making the Netflix experience feel personal and relevant by developing innovative approaches to how we promote, localize, and distribute content. Because our products touch both members and content creators, we seek someone who can fluidly move among both worlds, applying strong product principles and strategic frameworks to the member experience, while deeply empathizing with the art and craft required to create great content.

extras.title: As a Product Manager at Netflix you will:
content: Build a strategic roadmap and take product concepts from ideas through validation, shipping, measurement, and iteration.
Author strategy memos and presentations and represent your team’s work to senior executives.
Lead a team of stunning colleagues across design, engineering, and data science to deliver outstanding products to our customers.
Build business cases and measure the impact of your product innovation.
Deeply understand and socialize the evolving needs of our customers, with your design partners.

extras.title: As the Product Manager, Creative Innovation you will be responsible for:
content: Being the product manager that owns creative innovation products makes better promotional media assets for our members
Being the lead product manager partnering with our Product Creative Studio partners who are responsible for the promotional assets for product promotions
Developing and delivering a roadmap that balances the needs of our partner teams and prioritizes what is most impactful for our members and the business
Leading cross-functional teams including design, engineering, and data science to discover and execute opportunities
Communicating your strategy broadly throughout the organization

extras.title: Our wish list for the person in this role (remember, no one ever gets everything on their wish list!):
content: Experience working with creative teams and/or building products for creative teams
Experience working with the creation of promotional media (image and video)
Experience working on a product team with a proven record of prioritizing and successfully launching products or platforms
Worked in a direct-to-consumer business, where the consumer is paying for the service
Ability to inspire, motivate, and lead a cross-functional team - your ability to build strong relationships is critical to success
Deep experience using data to inform priorities and evaluate impact of initiatives
Experience with consumer product testing methodologies and running consumer tests
Excellent verbal and written communication skills - you will write a lot!
Experience working on internal products or B2B enterprise products
Has strong instincts for outstanding customer experience

Embodies the Netflix real values while also bringing a new perspective to improve our culture. We strongly believe that diversity of experiences, perspectives, and backgrounds will lead to a better environment for our employees and better products for our customerss
